ComicInfo.Title: Set the Controls For the Heart of the Sun
ComicInfo.Summary:
Barbarella has been lied to. Worse, she’s been weaponized, and someone’s going to answer for that, for sure. (Well, assuming she survives the judgement of the Esseverine sun-giants, and an armada of a thousand ships…)
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Dave Bullock | 1 | B | Cover B | Scott Chantler | 2 | C | Cover C | Eoin Marron & Chris O'Halloran | 3 | D | Cover D | Anthony Marques, Geraldo Borges & Valentina Pinto | 4 | E | Subscription Cover | Kenan Yarar & Mohan | 5 | F/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Eoin Marron | 6 | G/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Scott Chantler | 7 | H/RI | 1:30 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Dave Bullock | 8 |
